name: lnrlnm

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, clnr), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clnm), wcel(c0, crg))
stmt.pretty: simprbi(c0 ∈ LNoeR, (ringLMod ` c0)∈ LNoeM, c0 ∈ Ring)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, clnr), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clnm))
-| wb(wcel(c0, clnr), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clnm)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ LNoeR →(ringLMod ` c0)∈ LNoeM)
⊣ (c0 ∈ LNoeR ↔(c0 ∈ Ring ∧(ringLMod ` c0)∈ LNoeM))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, clnr), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clnm))
-| wb(wcel(c0, clnr), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clnm)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ LNoeR →(ringLMod ` c0)∈ LNoeM)
⊣ (c0 ∈ LNoeR ↔(c0 ∈ Ring ∧(ringLMod ` c0)∈ LNoeM))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, clnr), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clnm)))

comment: Left-Noetherian rings have Noetherian associated modules. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)
